name: DARK CORNER
description:
This is the demo version of DARK CORNER.

This version is build for PC.  Click the 'Instructions' button to follow game instructions.

Use Chrome and Binge extensions for better experience.

Keys:

W/UP - Move upwards

A/Left - Move leftwards

S/Down - Move downwards

D/Right - Move rightwards

Mouse - Hover over the screen to aim

Left Click/Ctrl. - To shoot (infinite) bullets

Esc. - Quit game

I - Zoom Out in Minimap

O - Zoom In in Minimap
